dialog.text: Got it. What is the weather like?
There are clouds every where in the sky, but it looks like the sun is setting. The mountains aren't perfectly flat.
Yes. Is there anything on the mountain?
On the bottom of the screen, in the left side, there are sparse hills. In the middle of the screen on the very bottom, there are sparse bushes as well.
Yup. Anything on the right of the mountains?
The right of the mountains dip down slightly. The hills should just be in the bottom 20% of the screen.
Sounds good! Can you take a peek?
The mountains should be more flat and the sun should come from the right. The mountains should also start a little higher.
Just fixed the mountains. I cannot really change the sun direction though.
There shouldn't be a peak on the right , it should just be all flat. It just dips down slightly at the right edge of the screen.
Gotcha. I think we are good.
